name: Last Voyage of the _____
oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it, then it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield and attach this Aura to it.

When this Aura leaves the battlefield, sacrifice enchanted creature.

name: Goblin Girder Gang
oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever you roll a result not stored on Goblin Girder Gang, you may store that result on it. When you do, Goblin Girder Gang deals 1 damage to any target without a hat.
Goblin Girder Gang gets +1/+0 for each result stored on it.

oracle_text:
First strike

This creature has protection from names that start with the same letter as a name sticker on it.

name: Monitor Monitor
oracle_text:
When Monitor Monitor enters the battlefield, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)
Once each turn, you may pay {1} to reroll one or more dice you rolled.
flavor_text: Nine fires, a hull breach, and a Quafloovian meganibbler escaped from the petting zoo. Things were suspiciously quiet.

name: Trivia Contest
oracle_text:
Visit — An opponent choses a black card, land card, or planeswalker card, then mills a card. You have ten seconds to name something from the chosen category that starts with the same letter as the milled card. If you do, claim the prize!
Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Trivia Contest and open an Attraction.
